content: f176 seeded rib stitch cowl by antonia shankland all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free for questions or support please email info@fairmountfibers com 12/2/22 © fairmount fibers ltd 2022 not to be reproduced or re-knit for profit page 1 of 2 f176 size stitch guide 22 circumference 14 tall unblocked seeded rib stitch multiple of 4 stitches note cowl will stretch wider when worn round 1 *knit 1 purl 3 repeat from * to end of round round 2 *knit 2 purl 1 k1 repeat from * to end of round materials repeat these 2 rounds for pattern manos del uruguay franca 100% superwash merino approx 150g/114 yds 2 skeins instructions shown in f9053 gold nugget cast on 88 stitches place marker to indicate beginning of each round join in the round being careful not to twist the us11 / 8mm 24 circular needle or size needed to obtain stitches work in seeded rib stitch until cowl measures 14 gauge or when about 3 yards of yarn remain bind off loosely stitch marker tapestry needle weave in ends gauge 22 stitches in seeded rib stitch = 4 all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free for questions or support please email info@fairmountfibers com 12/2/22 © fairmount fibers ltd 2022 not to be reproduced or re-knit for profit page 2 of 2
